seniority_level.evidence: Job posting lists Total Exp-6-7 Yrs (Relevant-4-5 Yrs) which aligns with senior‑level experience (5‑8 years). Title is Data Engineer/Associate Software Developer.

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly says Data Engineer and responsibilities focus on pipelines, ETL, and data platforms.

sub_specialty.evidence: Description mentions both batch and real‑time processing; emphasis on real‑time data handling and Azure Databricks streaming capabilities.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management duties, direct reports, or hiring responsibilities; role is focused on technical delivery.

primary_cloud.evidence: Mandatory skills list includes Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, Azure Blob; job title includes "Azure".

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers (AWS, GCP, etc.) are mentioned in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: The role explicitly calls for both batch and real‑time processing of data.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools such as Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, Prefect, or cloud‑native schedulers are referenced.

storage_layer.evidence: Azure Databricks (Delta Lake) and Azure Blob storage imply a lakehouse architecture; no explicit data‑warehouse product is listed.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Kochi, Kerala, India with no remote‑work language; implies candidates must be based in India.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job location in India places the work within the APAC region.

relocation_required.evidence: Posting does not mention any relocation assistance or requirement; expects candidates to already be in the specified location.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No statement about H‑1B sponsorship is provided.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of OPT/CPT eligibility; work authorization is implied for local candidates.

citizenship_required.evidence: The posting does not specify any citizenship or work‑authorization restrictions.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type (full‑time, contractor, etc.) is not stated.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits such as health, PTO, equity, or learning budget are listed.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The description does not discuss career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with diverse teams and senior engineers, suggesting informal mentorship.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions, titles, or advancement paths appears in the posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No reference to internal transfers or mobility programs.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit mention of IC, management, specialist, or architect tracks.

requirement_strictness.evidence: A long list of mandatory hard and soft skills with no nice‑to‑have items; phrasing uses "must have" language.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused specifically on data engineering tasks without mixing other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set (Azure Databricks, Spark, Python, ETL, etc.) aligns with a senior‑level data engineer with 6‑7 years experience.
